product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal is allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Supreme Advantage is positioned as the one-stop ULIP that helps achieve multiple life goals (education, home, retirement) through market-linked growth, guaranteed boosters, loyalty rewards and return of mortality charges.
key_highlights: Guaranteed Wealth Booster: Return of Premium Allocation Charges with 7% p.a. compounding growth
Return of Mortality Charges (ROMC) added back at milestones
Loyalty Additions starting from 16th policy year onwards
Systematic Partial Withdrawals after lock-in to create second income
Settlement Option available for maturity payout up to 5 years

core_benefits.details: Fund Value payable on maturity date if the Life Assured is alive. Option to receive lump sum or systematic payout for a maximum of 5 years under Settlement Option.
Higher of: (a) Prevailing Sum Assured (including top-ups), (b) Fund Value on date of intimation of death, (c) Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of total premiums paid including top-up premiums.
core_benefits.guarantee: Minimum 105% of Total Premiums Paid till date of death.
core_benefits.termination: Policy terminates on date of intimation of death.

core_benefits.details: Premium Allocation Charges deducted are accumulated at a guaranteed rate of 7% per annum (compounded annually) and added back as additional units at the end of the 15th policy year.
core_benefits.special_note: Supreme Advantage is marketed as 'effectively zero premium allocation charge' since deducted PAC is returned with guaranteed growth.

core_benefits.start: End of every year from 16th policy year until maturity
core_benefits.rate: 0.25% of average fund value of last 3 years (including current year)

core_benefits.details: 100% of mortality charges deducted are added back to fund value as additional units at milestones.

schedule.every_5_years_after_15: 100% mortality charges deducted in the last 5 years
schedule.at_maturity: 100% mortality charges deducted minus charges already returned

core_benefits.details: Second income option through systematic withdrawals available only after completion of 5-year lock-in period.

eligibility_and_parameters.maximum_premium: No limit, subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy (BAUP).

premium_allocation_charge.wealth_booster_return: PAC deducted is returned with 7% p.a. compounding at end of year 15

charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly based on age, gender, chosen sum assured, and underwriting policy.

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI regulations.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits applicable under Section 80C and Section 10(10D) (old regime). Consult tax advisor.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_guardrails.rebate_warning: Prohibition of rebate as per Section 41 of Insurance Act, 1938.
compliance_guardrails.misstatement_clause: Fraud and misstatement handled under Section 45 of Insurance Act.
compliance_guardrails.gst_note: GST depends on policyholder communication address.

retrieval_chunks.text: Death benefit is higher of Sum Assured, Fund Value, or guaranteed 105% of premiums paid including top-ups.
Premium allocation charges deducted are returned at year 15 with guaranteed 7% p.a. compounding growth, making charges effectively zero.
Loyalty additions start from 16th policy year and add 0.25% of average fund value every year till maturity.
100% mortality charges deducted are returned at year 15, every 5 years thereafter, and at maturity if policy stays active.
PAC is 6% annual (years 1–5), 5% non-annual, 3% single pay year 1. Policy admin charges capped at ₹500/month. FMC up to 1.35%.
